selected_quotes: Course of antimicrobial treatment as for #strep may be provided for #PANS with no evidence of GAS initiation.#PANDAS
Antimicrobial #prophylaxis in #PANDAS children may prevent neural injury from future #strep exacerbations.
Testing family members for #strep should be part of the GAS assessment at #PANS/#PANDAS onset exacerbations.
Great reference regarding the use of immunomodulatory therapies for PANS.
Hot off the presses, new PANS JCAP. If you know a good pediatrician please forward to them ASAP.

author.name: TheresaWillett MDPhD
author.description: Pediatrician, Immunologist, PANS team detective. Weird to my cuore (PAPVR). Lover of cake, not frosting. Opinions are mine- I licked them.

author.name: PANDAS Ireland
author.description: An autoimmune disorder in children which affects the brain causing tics, OCD, severe anxiety, and irrational fears.

author.name: PANDAS PPN
author.description: PANDAS Physicians Network (PPN) is a 501c3 nonprofit dedicated to helping medical professionals diagnose, manage,& treat #PANDAS/#PANS patients. #strep #OCD

author.name: PANDAS/PANS UK
author.description: PANDAS/PANS UK provides support to families of children with PANDAS/PANS. We aim to raise awareness of an easily treated, often misdiagnosed condition in kids.

author.name: PANDAS PPN
author.description: PANDAS Physicians Network (PPN) is a 501c3 nonprofit dedicated to helping medical professionals diagnose, manage,& treat #PANDAS/#PANS patients. #strep #OCD

author.name: NE PANS PANDAS Assoc
author.description: PANDAS & PANS is triggered by Strep & other infections. Symptoms can include OCD, Tics, Anorexia, ADHD, Anxiety, Regression, Behavioral & Neurological changes.

news.title: New treatment guidelines for pediatric acute onset neuropsychiatric syndrome (PANS/PANDAS)
news.summary: New Rochelle, NY, July 19, 2017 -- A panel of leading clinicians and researchers across various general and specialty pediatric fields developed comprehensive treatment recommendations to help guide the management of youngsters with a broad spectrum…

news.title: Experts revise PANS/PANDAS treatment guidelines
news.summary: A panel of clinicians and researchers recently published revised treatment recommendations for management of Pediatric Acute Onset Neuropsychiatric Syndrome and Pediatric Autoimmune Neuropsychiatric Syndrome Associated with Streptococcal Infection.

news.title: PANS and PANDAS – A step forward?
news.summary: In the Journal of Child and Adolescent Psychopharmacology’s July 2017 issue, a group of respected individuals representing diverse expertise published “guidelines” to support clinical management of pediatric acute-onset neuropsychiatric syndrome (PANS…
